thread.title: Bill Belichick hasn't been to the grocery store 'in a couple years' | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
thread.title_full: Bill Belichick hasn't been to the grocery store 'in a couple years' | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian | Boston Herald

author: Adam Kurkjian
title: Bill Belichick hasn't been to the grocery store 'in a couple years' | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
text:
FOXBORO â€” With the rematch of last season's AFC title game with the Colts coming up Sunday night, most of the storylines have been about Deflategate and how the Colts got the ball rolling on sanctions against the Patriots and Tom Brady, whose four-game suspension by the NFL was eventually wiped out on appeal.
At today's press conference, Bill Belichick was asked if anyone had taken him aside "at the grocery store" and asked for the Pats to exact any special revenge on the Colts.
His response was purely Belichick-ian.
"I haven't been to the grocery store in a couple years," Belichick said to a round of laughter.
No surprise on Belichick's overall take: The team is approaching the game like any other.
